import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import logonobr from '../logo no-background.png'; const OrderManagement = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [data, setData] = useState([]); const formatPrice = (price) => { return price ? price.toLocaleString("vi-VN") : ''; }; useEffect(() => { const fetchOrder = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3308/getorder`,); setData(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data', error); } }; fetchOrder(); }, []); const handleChange = () => { } return (
